content=Banjishte Hotel and Spa is the perfect place for acomodation in Debar. It is located 880 m above the see level. If you adore the nature and the clean mountain air, you've got to visit this hotel.

content=Hotel Kosovrasti is located on the cost of Debar's Lake. A perfect place to stay and also get a medical treatment using thermo-mineral waters.

- this monastery is dedicated to St. John the Forerunner. It was made in the 18th century and includes beautiful frescos and icons located in Rostuse. It is located about 20 minutes north of Debar. It is a must-see when visitng Macedonia.
